content: The "Countering Violent Extremism Act of 2015" or the "CVE Act" authorizes the Office for Countering Violent Extremism within the Department of Homeland Security. The Office for Countering Violent Extremism in the Department of Homeland Security is established with the Assistant Secretary for Countering Violent Extremism appointed by the Secretary. Permanent staff with expertise in technical, media, communications, or marketing backgrounds will be assigned or hired for the office.
